trans-unit.source: Azure RemoteApp FAQ
trans-unit.target: Azure RemoteApp FAQ

trans-unit.source: Frequently asked questions about Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Frequently asked questions about Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Azure RemoteApp FAQ
trans-unit.target: Azure RemoteApp FAQ

trans-unit.source: We've heard the following questions about Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: We've heard the following questions about Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Have others?
trans-unit.target: Have others?

trans-unit.source: Visit the [RemoteApp forums](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/azure/home?forum=AzureRemoteApp) and let us know what you need to know.
trans-unit.target: Visit the [RemoteApp forums](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/azure/home?forum=AzureRemoteApp) and let us know what you need to know.

trans-unit.source: What is Azure RemoteApp?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure RemoteApp?

trans-unit.source: **What is Azure RemoteApp?** RemoteApp is an Azure service helps you provide secure, remote access to applications from many different user devices.
trans-unit.target: **What is Azure RemoteApp?** RemoteApp is an Azure service helps you provide secure, remote access to applications from many different user devices.

trans-unit.source: Read more about [Azure RemoteApp](remoteapp-whatis.md).
trans-unit.target: Read more about [Azure RemoteApp](remoteapp-whatis.md).

trans-unit.source: **What are the two kinds of deployment options?** There are two kinds of RemoteApp deployments (or collections): cloud and hybrid.
trans-unit.target: **What are the two kinds of deployment options?** There are two kinds of RemoteApp deployments (or collections): cloud and hybrid.

trans-unit.source: Figure out which [deployment option](remoteapp-whatis.md) works best for your organization.
trans-unit.target: Figure out which [deployment option](remoteapp-whatis.md) works best for your organization.

trans-unit.source: Supported configurations
trans-unit.target: Supported configurations

trans-unit.source: **What are the service limits?** You can learn about the default settings and serivce limits of Azure RemoteApp in [Azure Subscription and Service Limits, Quotas, and Constraints](.\azure-subscription-service-limits.md).
trans-unit.target: **What are the service limits?** You can learn about the default settings and serivce limits of Azure RemoteApp in [Azure Subscription and Service Limits, Quotas, and Constraints](.\azure-subscription-service-limits.md).

trans-unit.source: Let us know if you have more questions.
trans-unit.target: Let us know if you have more questions.

trans-unit.source: **How many users do I have to have?** There's a minimum of 20 users.
trans-unit.target: **How many users do I have to have?** There's a minimum of 20 users.

trans-unit.source: Let me repeat that to be super clear - the MINIMUM is 20.
trans-unit.target: Let me repeat that to be super clear - the MINIMUM is 20.

trans-unit.source: You will be billed for 20.
trans-unit.target: You will be billed for 20.

trans-unit.source: **Are custom line-of-business (LOB) applications supported?** Yes.
trans-unit.target: **Are custom line-of-business (LOB) applications supported?** Yes.

trans-unit.source: To use a custom application in Azure RemoteApp, create a [custom template image](remoteapp-create-custom-image.md), and then upload it to the RemoteApp collection.
trans-unit.target: To use a custom application in Azure RemoteApp, create a [custom template image](remoteapp-create-custom-image.md), and then upload it to the RemoteApp collection.

trans-unit.source: **Will my custom LOB application work in Azure RemoteApp?** The best way to figure that out is to test it.
trans-unit.target: **Will my custom LOB application work in Azure RemoteApp?** The best way to figure that out is to test it.

trans-unit.source: Review the [application compatibility requirements](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=18704) and check out the [RD Compatibility Center](http://www.rdcompatibility.com/compatibility/default.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Review the [application compatibility requirements](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=18704) and check out the [RD Compatibility Center](http://www.rdcompatibility.com/compatibility/default.aspx).

trans-unit.source: **Which deployment method (cloud or hybrid) is best for my organization?** Hybrid collections provide the most complete experience if you want full integration with single sign-on (SSO) and secure on-premises network connectivity.
trans-unit.target: **Which deployment method (cloud or hybrid) is best for my organization?** Hybrid collections provide the most complete experience if you want full integration with single sign-on (SSO) and secure on-premises network connectivity.

trans-unit.source: Cloud collections provide an agile and easy way to isolate your deployment by using multiple authentication methods.
trans-unit.target: Cloud collections provide an agile and easy way to isolate your deployment by using multiple authentication methods.

trans-unit.source: Read more about the [deployment options](remoteapp-whatis.md).
trans-unit.target: Read more about the [deployment options](remoteapp-whatis.md).

trans-unit.source: **The hybrid collection requires a VNET. Can we use our existing VNET?** You can if the existing VNET is an Azure VNET.
trans-unit.target: **The hybrid collection requires a VNET. Can we use our existing VNET?** You can if the existing VNET is an Azure VNET.

trans-unit.source: See "Step 1: Set up your virtual network" in the [hybrid collection instructions](remoteapp-create-hybrid-deployment.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: See "Step 1: Set up your virtual network" in the [hybrid collection instructions](remoteapp-create-hybrid-deployment.md) for more information.

trans-unit.source: **Can I use a cloud or existing virtual machine as the template for my RemoteApp collection?** Yes!
trans-unit.target: **Can I use a cloud or existing virtual machine as the template for my RemoteApp collection?** Yes!

trans-unit.source: You can create an image based on an Azure VM, use one of the images included with your subscription, or create a custom image.
trans-unit.target: You can create an image based on an Azure VM, use one of the images included with your subscription, or create a custom image.

trans-unit.source: Check out the [RemoteApp image options](remoteapp-imageoptions.md).
trans-unit.target: Check out the [RemoteApp image options](remoteapp-imageoptions.md).

trans-unit.source: **We have SQL or another database either on-premises or in Azure. Which deployment type should we use?** That depends on where your SQL or backend database is.
trans-unit.target: **We have SQL or another database either on-premises or in Azure. Which deployment type should we use?** That depends on where your SQL or backend database is.

trans-unit.source: If the database is in a private network, use the hybrid collection.
trans-unit.target: If the database is in a private network, use the hybrid collection.

trans-unit.source: If the database is exposed to the Internet and allows client connections to connect to it, you can use the cloud collection.
trans-unit.target: If the database is exposed to the Internet and allows client connections to connect to it, you can use the cloud collection.

trans-unit.source: **What about drive mapping, USB and serial port, clipboard sharing, and printer redirection?** All of those features are supported in Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: **What about drive mapping, USB and serial port, clipboard sharing, and printer redirection?** All of those features are supported in Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Clipboard sharing and printer redirection is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Clipboard sharing and printer redirection is enabled by default.

trans-unit.source: You can learn more about redirection [here](remoteapp-redirection.md).
trans-unit.target: You can learn more about redirection [here](remoteapp-redirection.md).

trans-unit.source: **How about authentication? Which methods are supported?** The cloud collection supports Microsoft accounts and Azure Active Directory accounts, which are Office 365 accounts as well.
trans-unit.target: **How about authentication? Which methods are supported?** The cloud collection supports Microsoft accounts and Azure Active Directory accounts, which are Office 365 accounts as well.

trans-unit.source: The hybrid collection supports only Azure Active Directory accounts that have been synced (using a tool like [Azure Active Directory Sync](http://blogs.technet.com/b/ad/archive/2014/09/16/azure-active-directory-sync-is-now-ga.aspx)) from a Windows Server Active Directory deployment; specifically, either synced with the Password Synchronization option or synced with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) federation configured.
trans-unit.target: The hybrid collection supports only Azure Active Directory accounts that have been synced (using a tool like [Azure Active Directory Sync](http://blogs.technet.com/b/ad/archive/2014/09/16/azure-active-directory-sync-is-now-ga.aspx)) from a Windows Server Active Directory deployment; specifically, either synced with the Password Synchronization option or synced with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) federation configured.

trans-unit.source: You can also configure [Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)](../../services/multi-factor-authentication/).
trans-unit.target: You can also configure [Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)](../../services/multi-factor-authentication/).

trans-unit.source: **Note:** The Azure Active Directory users must be from the tenant that's associated with your subscription.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** The Azure Active Directory users must be from the tenant that's associated with your subscription.

trans-unit.source: (You can view and modify your subscription on the **Settings** tab in the portal.
trans-unit.target: (You can view and modify your subscription on the **Settings** tab in the portal.

trans-unit.source: See [Change the Azure Active Directory tenant used by RemoteApp](remoteapp-changetenant.md) for more information.)
trans-unit.target: See [Change the Azure Active Directory tenant used by RemoteApp](remoteapp-changetenant.md) for more information.)

trans-unit.source: **Why can't I give my Azure Active Directory account access?** The Azure Active Directory users must be from the directory that's associated with your subscription.
trans-unit.target: **Why can't I give my Azure Active Directory account access?** The Azure Active Directory users must be from the directory that's associated with your subscription.

trans-unit.source: You can view or modify that directory on the Settings tab in the portal.
trans-unit.target: You can view or modify that directory on the Settings tab in the portal.

trans-unit.source: See [Change the Azure Active Directory tenant used by RemoteApp](remoteapp-changetenant.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: See [Change the Azure Active Directory tenant used by RemoteApp](remoteapp-changetenant.md) for more information.

trans-unit.source: **Which devices and operating systems do the client applications support?** Client applications are available for Windows 8.1, Windows 8, Windows 7 Service Pack 1, iOS, Mac OS X, Windows RT, Android devices, and Windows Phone.
trans-unit.target: **Which devices and operating systems do the client applications support?** Client applications are available for Windows 8.1, Windows 8, Windows 7 Service Pack 1, iOS, Mac OS X, Windows RT, Android devices, and Windows Phone.

trans-unit.source: We also support the Windows 10 preview.
trans-unit.target: We also support the Windows 10 preview.

trans-unit.source: [Download](https://www.remoteapp.windowsazure.com/ClientDownload/AllClients.aspx) a RemoteApp client now.
trans-unit.target: [Download](https://www.remoteapp.windowsazure.com/ClientDownload/AllClients.aspx) a RemoteApp client now.

trans-unit.source: **Does Azure RemoteApp support Thin Clients?** Yes, the following Windows Embedded thin clients are supported:
trans-unit.target: **Does Azure RemoteApp support Thin Clients?** Yes, the following Windows Embedded thin clients are supported:

trans-unit.source: Windows Embedded Standard 7 with Service Pack 1
trans-unit.target: Windows Embedded Standard 7 with Service Pack 1

trans-unit.source: Windows Embedded POSReady7
trans-unit.target: Windows Embedded POSReady7

trans-unit.source: Windows Embedded Thin PC
trans-unit.target: Windows Embedded Thin PC

trans-unit.source: Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry
trans-unit.target: Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry

trans-unit.source: **Which version of Windows Server is supported for the Remote Desktop Session Host (RDSH)?** Windows Server 2012 R2.
trans-unit.target: **Which version of Windows Server is supported for the Remote Desktop Session Host (RDSH)?** Windows Server 2012 R2.

trans-unit.source: Support and feedback
trans-unit.target: Support and feedback

trans-unit.source: **Can I try this service for free?** Yes.
trans-unit.target: **Can I try this service for free?** Yes.

trans-unit.source: There is a free trial available for 30 days.
trans-unit.target: There is a free trial available for 30 days.

trans-unit.source: After the trial ends, you can transition to a paid account (which you can use in production) or stop using the service.
trans-unit.target: After the trial ends, you can transition to a paid account (which you can use in production) or stop using the service.

trans-unit.source: Start your free trial by going to [manage.windowsazure.com](http://manage.windowsazure.com) - create a new instance of RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Start your free trial by going to [manage.windowsazure.com](http://manage.windowsazure.com) - create a new instance of RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: With the free trial, you can build 2 instances of RemoteApp with 10 users per instance.
trans-unit.target: With the free trial, you can build 2 instances of RemoteApp with 10 users per instance.

trans-unit.source: Remember that this trial only lives for 30 days.
trans-unit.target: Remember that this trial only lives for 30 days.

trans-unit.source: **What is the support plan for RemoteApp?** Support for billing and subscription management is provided at no cost.
trans-unit.target: **What is the support plan for RemoteApp?** Support for billing and subscription management is provided at no cost.

trans-unit.source: Technical support is available through the [Azure service plans](../../../support/plans/).
trans-unit.target: Technical support is available through the [Azure service plans](../../../support/plans/).

trans-unit.source: You can also get free community support through our [Azure discussion forum](http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/windowsazure/home?forum=AzureRemoteApp).
trans-unit.target: You can also get free community support through our [Azure discussion forum](http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/windowsazure/home?forum=AzureRemoteApp).

trans-unit.source: **How much does RemoteApp cost?** Check out [Azure RemoteApp Pricing Details ](../../../pricing/details/remoteapp/).
trans-unit.target: **How much does RemoteApp cost?** Check out [Azure RemoteApp Pricing Details ](../../../pricing/details/remoteapp/).

trans-unit.source: **How do I submit feedback?** Visit the [feedback forum](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/247748-azure-remoteapp).
trans-unit.target: **How do I submit feedback?** Visit the [feedback forum](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/247748-azure-remoteapp).

trans-unit.source: **Who can I talk to learn more about Azure RemoteApp?** In addition to our [discussion forum](http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/windowsazure/home?forum=AzureRemoteApp), which is a great place to post questions, you can join the weekly [Ask the Experts webinar](https://azureinfo.microsoft.com/US-Azure-WBNR-FY15-11Nov-AzureRemoteAppAskTheExperts-Registration-Page.html), where we talk about all things RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: **Who can I talk to learn more about Azure RemoteApp?** In addition to our [discussion forum](http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/windowsazure/home?forum=AzureRemoteApp), which is a great place to post questions, you can join the weekly [Ask the Experts webinar](https://azureinfo.microsoft.com/US-Azure-WBNR-FY15-11Nov-AzureRemoteAppAskTheExperts-Registration-Page.html), where we talk about all things RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: **What about RemoteApp documentation?** We're so glad you asked.
trans-unit.target: **What about RemoteApp documentation?** We're so glad you asked.

trans-unit.target: We also have a number of videos about RemoteApp.
